items.sentence: I think I've figured out a way to convince Tom to help us.

The dress Mary bought yesterday doesn't fit her very well.

In all likelihood, the president will serve a second term.

Tom didn't get the promotion that he was expecting to get.
I don't think that Tom would ever say something like that.
You're one of the most inconsiderate people I've ever met.
